segments.text: Looking in, I see the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, basin full, water spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It hits the cabinet doors and pools on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Left side, cabinet doors swung wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar inside, boy's hand dipping in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's on the stool, body stretched, stool tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands close, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating their cookie heist well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a funny story later.
segments.speaker: PAR
